raw_body: ABEYSURIYA – DARSHAN RAVINDRA (RAVI) Dearly beloved husband of Dilani,​ loving father of Dr. Sanduni and Thilina,​ father-in-law of Sakya and Erandi,​ loving son of late Dr. Punniyasri Abeysuriya and late Dr. Mrs. Rohini Abeysuriya,​ loving son-in-law of late A.S. Ranatunga and Rani Ranatunga,​ passed away. Remains lie at “The Respect Home” by Jayaratne’s,​ Borella from 11 a.m. onwards on Friday 27th October 2023 followed by cremation at General Cemetery (Old crematorium),​ Borella at 12.00 Noon on Saturday,​ 28th October 2023. No Flowers by request. Any donations,​ in memory to be given to the Neurosurgical Unit at the National Hospital of Sri Lanka.068791
